Uses of Interface
org.assertj.swing.core.ComponentFinder

Packages that use ComponentFinder
org.assertj.swing.core Low-level components that enable functional testing of AWT and Swing Components. 
org.assertj.swing.fixture Public API, source of FEST's power and flexibility.
